decisions.description: Decision Required to determine whether to send Oocyte Xfer Verification or not.

Flow.description: Generates Couple/Single Consents based off cycle type and automatically sends via AirSlate.

formulas.name: EmailCheckFormula
formulas.expression: CASE( {!Get_Consent.Patients_Donors__r.Email}, {!Get_Consent.Patients_Donors__r.Partner__r.Email}, "Emails are the Same", "Emails are Different" )

Flow.label: Consent Generation Flow

fields.name: SameEmailText
fields.fieldText: The patient and partner email address is the same. This is incredibly bad practice because it means the patient or partner can provide full cycle consent, as well as receiving any sample specific communications intended for their partner. Please change this immediately before re-attempting to send any consents.

fields.name: Copy_1_of_FET_IVF_TEXT
fields.fieldText: ﻿Would you like to generate a FET or VOT consent within this IVF cycle? Please read the options carefully.

value.stringValue: [{"label":"Generate VOT Consent","value":"Select this option to generate a bog-standard VOT consent."},{"label":"Generate FET Consent","value":"Only select this option if you're intending to utilise a frozen embryo within this VOT Cycle"}]

fields.name: FET_IVF_TEXT
fields.fieldText: ﻿Would you like to generate a FET or VOT consent within this IVF cycle? Please read the options carefully.

value.stringValue: [{"label":"Generate IVF Consent","value":"Select this option to generate a bog-standard IVF consent."},{"label":"Generate FET Consent","value":"Only select this option if you're intending to utilise a frozen embryo within this IVF Cycle"}]

fields.name: SS_Text
fields.fieldText: This Couple has been identified as Same-sex. If an Oocyte Transfer Consent is required, please select this option below. If not, please select the Cycle Consent option to continue as usual.

value.stringValue: [{"label":"Send Oocyte Transfer & Cycle Consent","value":"Selecting this option sends an Oocyte Transfer Consent and a Cycle Consent"},{"label":"Send Cycle Consent Only","value":"Selecting this option sends only the Cycle Consent as normal."}]

fields.name: SS_Text_0
fields.fieldText: This Couple has been identified as Same-sex. If an Oocyte Transfer Consent is required, please select this option below. If not, please select the Cycle Consent option to continue as usual.

value.stringValue: [{"label":"Send Oocyte Transfer & Cycle Consent","value":"Selecting this option sends an Oocyte Transfer Consent and a Cycle Consent"},{"label":"Send Cycle Consent Only","value":"Selecting this option sends only the Cycle Consent as normal."}]

fields.name: SuccessText
fields.fieldText: Consent(s) successfully generated. Please wait a few minutes for this to be delivered to the patient. This will attach to the file once signed.

fields.name: PRPTEXT
fields.fieldText: You have successfully sent a PRP Consent to {!Get_Consent.Patients_Donors__r.First_Name__c}. Please allow 30-60 seconds for this to attach to the files tab and refresh as necessary.

fields.name: TARFO_Display_Text
fields.fieldText: The Partner's email address is blank and therefore a TARFO consent cannot be generated. Please add an email address for the partner, refresh this page and try again.

textTemplates.name: EmailText
textTemplates.text:
Dear {!Get_Consent.Patients_Donors__r.FirstName},
You have been sent an electronic consent to this email address. We request that you have this filled and signed before the cycle commences, failing this your cycle will be cancelled. This consent form is an important document that will indicate to the Compass lab your intentions with regards to your gametes (eggs and sperm). If you are unsure of any of the questions on the form please bring it with you to your initial appointment and one of our friendly team members will assist.
Can't find this? Please wait 5 minutes, and check your junk and spam folders/search for “AirSlate” or “Compass” in your inbox. If you are still unable to locate this consent, please get in touch and report this to a Compass team member for further assistance.
Kind Regards, {!$User.FirstName} {!$User.LastName}, {!$User.Title}
